channel.title: WiFi Bridge
channel.description:
I have a DSLite that I'd like to connect to the various game networks (Pokemon WiFi connect, etc). The problem is, the DSLite didn't ship with the ability to connect to WPA2 networks. Now, the obvious solution would be to change the networking to WEP, but you can probably guess the down sides (lower security, connection problems, etc).
Then I had an idea. Maybe I could use my Samsung Galaxy S2 as a sort of bridge. Create a WiFi hotspot with my phone, which I can use WEP security, and from my phone, connect to my WPA2 network.
Does anyone have any ideas on how to do something like that.
